title: Pre-Service Elementary Teacher Competency Development Program Using Inquiry-Based Scaffolding (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational elementary education theories and basic understanding of social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: Providing a mobile-optimized learning environment for in-service teachers. Emphasizing self-directed inquiry activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Preservice teachers enhance critical thinking skills (achieving an N-gain of 0.18 or higher) through scientific literacy-based argumentative inquiry processes
Preservice teachers improve social studies problem-solving abilities (achieving an N-gain of 0.20 or higher) by demonstrating teamwork in collaborative learning environments
Preservice teachers strengthen elementary social studies teaching competencies (achieving an N-gain of 0.22 or higher) by applying argumentation-based learning designs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
